name: The Golden Girl
description:
Unleash your inner Art Curator: Perform modern alchemy and create value from paint and canvas. Discover the stories underneath the collection and satisfy a customer with exquisite taste!

- 1 Minute to choose the best art for a collection

- Get rated on accuracy and creativity. Can you discover all hidden stories?

- Enjoy a smooth jazz soundtrack

This game was created as part of the itch.io Mini Jam Gold. It was made within three days in GameMaker Studio 2 by a two person team, so please do not expect the world. It is our first released game ever and we are proud of it - please be kind.

Controls are keyboard-only right now. They should be self-explanatory, but you can always press ESC to bring up a little menu, explaining some of the more obscure keyboard commands.

If there is enough interest, we are happy to extend its current shape further, with new art, new levels, new challenges, controller input and more stories to discover. Have fun!
